div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 4 damage. ARMOR PIERCING (ignore all Defense buffs and armor).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 3 damage + 1 damage per Heat you currently have (max +6). Remove all Heat after attack resolves.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Block 3 damage from next attack. You gain +1 to all defense rolls until end of turn.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: When you would take Component Damage, prevent 1 Component Damage. Gain 1 Heat.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 7 damage. If you have 2+ Component Damage, deal 9 damage instead. Dwarven fury channeled through pain.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Each time you take Component Damage, your next attack deals +2 damage. This bonus stacks (3 Component Damage = +6 damage on next attack).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Passive: The first Component Damage you take each round is ignored. You are Ironborn.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Reduce damage from next attack by 2. Gain 1 Heat. Dwarven skin hardens like stone under pressure.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Passive: When you take Component Damage, your next attack deals +3 damage. This bonus is consumed after one attack. Ancestors fuel your vengeance.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: When you would take lethal damage (deck would reach 0), prevent up to 5 damage. Once per mission. The ancestors protect.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
